content: {"name": "Healthy Waltham Mobile Pantry   ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "TO RECEIVE FOOD:\nPlease sign up for an appointment through the Your Market website link here: https://www.your-market.org/\nChoose Healthy Waltham from the list of pantries. Registration is available in multiple languages. Please register if you have not already done so and choose your appointment time. Appointment sign-ups will be released approximately 2 weeks prior to the pantry date. Walk-ins are welcome from 4:30 pm \u2013 5:00 pm.", "email": "", "url": "https://healthywaltham.org/food-pantries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5 Cherry Street", "address_2": null, "city": "South Side", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02453", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3673077, "longitude": -71.24216299999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(781) 314-5647", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:30", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}]}
